Name: Puzzle Out VR
About the game: Experience the only puzzle game in VR that features tangram puzzles in a space capsule! Features Move around an atmospheric setting 10 interesting levels Increasing difficulty to test your dexterity and visual thinking Destroyable crystals to suspend the wall's movement See the surroundings and distant earth through your space helmet with visor UI Autosave Atmospheric music and sound effects Story It's the age of commercial and cheap space travel which allows everyone to travel between planets in the solar system. You are on your journey back home to earth from an expedition to mars to find rare crystals. As you approach the earth, a strange alien wall appears to hinder you from examine the crystals.
Meta Title: Puzzle Out VR: Mar 5, 2019, Glock Software and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Puzzle Out VR? Check out the release date (Mar 5, 2019), developer insights from Glock Software, and a complete game summary.
